channel.title: How do i prevent so much lagg?
channel.description: Ok im hosting a EarthScape PKZ V.1 downloaded source. And i got 5 players online, and it was so laggy nobody could hardely walk. Im hosting on a laptop but i have highspeed internet. Also i am running on a wireless connection, any ideas???

item.title: How do i prevent so much lagg?
item.dc:creator: @Tr1pl3k1ll Tr1pl3k1ll
item.description:
@Tr1pl3k1ll wrote:

I will run a disk clean-up and de-frag… Then i will download another source and try it out, whats a good source to download? And if you could, post a link.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i prevent so much lagg?

item.title: How do i prevent so much lagg?
item.dc:creator: @zamathiar zamathiar
item.description:
@zamathiar wrote:

1: Your source is very laggy trust me i know from experience. That may be one problem.
2: Try Another Source Sorry.
3: Your laptop may need a disc clean-up or u may need to just switch to a desktop.

Ty

~Owner Soulx~ of Soul VX PK

Read full topic
item.source: How do i prevent so much lagg?

item.title: How do i prevent so much lagg?
item.dc:creator: @Tr1pl3k1ll Tr1pl3k1ll
item.description:
@Tr1pl3k1ll wrote:

Soule:

Try to not have alot of Files/Commands or get a new Source, and dont have alot of things running into your source.

What do you mean “don’t have alot of things runnin into my source?”
